LABEL: 0x2DC
STRING: There was the girl who should have died.

LABEL: 0x304
STRING: A life that should have vanished.

LABEL: 0x322
STRING: A thread that should have been cut.

LABEL: 0x3F8
STRING: It was a scene that felt like a lie.

LABEL: 0x434
STRING: But, this wasn't what I had wished for.

LABEL: 0x4B6
STRING: The sight before us spoke for itself.

LABEL: 0x528
STRING: Her legs were unsteady to the point where it was a miracle she was still standing.

LABEL: 0x568
STRING: To put it simply, she was a corpse.

LABEL: 0x60A
STRING: It was a strange, bewitching, and bizarre sight.

LABEL: 0x72C
STRING: What was she telling us not to do?

LABEL: 0x77E
STRING: The girl staring at us from the pressurization room surveyed the area with her usual emotionless eyes.

LABEL: 0x858
STRING: She just looked at me without saying anything.

LABEL: 0x888
STRING: I wondered what emotion dwelled in those eyes.

LABEL: 0x8B2
STRING: What was she trying to say?

LABEL: 0x8E4
STRING: When she looked at me, I couldn't breathe.

LABEL: 0x9B7
STRING: She had died because I hadn't taken her hand.

LABEL: 0xA39
STRING: I didn't want her to die.

LABEL: 0xA63
STRING: What did she, who was alive, think at this moment?

LABEL: 0xB30
STRING: Reiri looked away from me as she muttered.

LABEL: 0xB62
STRING: Then, she looked down at the palm of her hand.

LABEL: 0xB94
STRING: There was a green point of light.

LABEL: 0xBB4
STRING: She looked with narrowed eyes at the specks of light that were shining faintly and flickering gently.

LABEL: 0xCB4
STRING: She had been listening to us.

LABEL: 0xD2E
STRING: No one could do anything for her.

LABEL: 0xD5E
STRING: To a girl who thought about her sister, we――

LABEL: 0xD90
STRING: Consumed by madness, Touri was already as good as dead.

LABEL: 0xDD0
STRING: She had been wandering the ship with a blade in hand.

LABEL: 0xDFC
STRING: It was Yukari who had stopped her as she surrendered herself to a faint dream, to the flames of fleeting passion.

LABEL: 0xE44
STRING: The method was cruel, and I couldn't fathom how much she must have suffered.

LABEL: 0xE8C
STRING: Yukari had put an end to Touri, but that was because no one else could.

LABEL: 0xF16
STRING: She was the only one who could save Touri.

LABEL: 0xF9A
STRING: In the stagnant atmosphere, Reiri looked up again.

LABEL: 0xFDF
STRING: 「I guess I'm going to die, too――」

LABEL: 0x1024
STRING: I wanted to run up to her.

LABEL: 0x10B8
STRING: It bound my hands, my feet, and my throat.

LABEL: 0x10DC
STRING: If I touched her, there was no turning back.

LABEL: 0x10FC
STRING: I would become just like him, her, and Reiri――

LABEL: 0x11DF
STRING: She coughed without any warning, blood gushing from her mouth.

LABEL: 0x121B
STRING: She twisted her body in pain while clinging to the wall to endure it.

LABEL: 0x1255
STRING: Her body was weak to begin with, but this was clearly different from before.

LABEL: 0x129B
STRING: Suffering, pain, and every part of her now near-dead body assaulted her consciousness.

LABEL: 0x1357
STRING: It was only a matter of time.

LABEL: 0x1647
STRING: At this moment, when no one else could do anything, Hiragino was the only one who saw.

LABEL: 0x1687
STRING: While everyone else surrendered themselves to the flow of time in the face of the dying Reiri,

LABEL: 0x170F
STRING: Hiragino walked forward, slowly but surely.

LABEL: 0x186B
STRING: There was no logic behind it.

LABEL: 0x1887
STRING: Yukari merely directed her mass of passionate and sad emotions toward him.

LABEL: 0x18D1
STRING: The tip of her speargun was pointing at him.

LABEL: 0x192F
STRING: Her feelings were clear, but Hiragino didn't turn around.

LABEL: 0x196F
STRING: The coldness of his profile spoke volumes.

LABEL: 0x19A0
STRING: 「...I already touched her earlier inside the rescue ship.」

LABEL: 0x19E0
STRING: 「What's the point of avoiding her now?」

LABEL: 0x1BAF
STRING: Her face twisted like an abandoned cat as she screamed.

LABEL: 0x1BE1
STRING: Would an abandoned cat cry like this if it knew?

LABEL: 0x1C31
STRING: That it would never see him again.

LABEL: 0x1C5D
STRING: With one final smile, he told her that it was over.

LABEL: 0x1D7F
STRING: Her voice was sincere, as were her words and feelings.

LABEL: 0x1DC1
STRING: I was nothing more than an observer.

LABEL: 0x1E29
STRING: As I stood still, the smart girl beside me pointed her finger straight ahead.

LABEL: 0x2052
STRING: 「Have you ever turned a rainbow inside out?」

LABEL: 0x2177
STRING: 「What does it look like to you?」

LABEL: 0x21DF
STRING: The place Tokiwa was pointing to...

LABEL: 0x222F
STRING: But at the man approaching her――

LABEL: 0x2344
STRING: How did Hiragino Sousuke look in her eyes...?

LABEL: 0x23B2
STRING: Even her whisper echoed in my ears in this deep sea.

LABEL: 0x23DC
STRING: We were trapped inside this submarine.

LABEL: 0x2416
STRING: Here, Tokiwa's voice gripped the hearts of everyone present.

LABEL: 0x24D6
STRING: I turned around at her voice.

LABEL: 0x2510
STRING: The speargun rolled at her feet.

LABEL: 0x2536
STRING: In an instant, she fell down.

LABEL: 0x257C
STRING: Reiri had spoken about "her eyes" while on the verge of death――

LABEL: 0x25AE
STRING: As I thought, she could see it.

LABEL: 0x25DC
STRING: She was the only one who could.

LABEL: 0x2606
STRING: What color was this dark, warped world reflected in Tokiwa's eyes?

LABEL: 0x2709
STRING: He stopped dead in his tracks without saying a word.

LABEL: 0x276B
STRING: He forced his rusted joints to move again,

LABEL: 0x27BB
STRING: Hiragino took another step toward Reiri.

LABEL: 0x286F
STRING: She didn't even have the strength to scream anymore.

LABEL: 0x289F
STRING: Her voice had no power. It was just a lonely cry that reached no one.

LABEL: 0x2925
STRING: What was left there was just Yukari, stripped of all her titles.

LABEL: 0x2A17
STRING: His voice, gently calling her name, slowly seeped into the murky iceberg.

LABEL: 0x2AC9
STRING: 「My role in the <SHEEP III> is more or less to be the "ship's doctor."」

LABEL: 0x2B77
STRING: 「Whether I've fulfilled that role or not, I don't know, but... that's fine.」

LABEL: 0x2BBD
STRING: 「As the ship's doctor, my obligation is to help as many people as possible.」

LABEL: 0x2C03
STRING: 「Although the discussion immediately turns to saving lives in this kind of situation,

LABEL: 0x2C49
STRING: it's my mission and professional duty to help people regardless.」

LABEL: 0x2D7C
STRING: 「As far as I'm concerned, it doesn't matter if it's my duty or not.」

LABEL: 0x2DC0
STRING: 「I'm just doing what I think I should.」

LABEL: 0x2E74
STRING: His voice was calm, yet powerful.

LABEL: 0x2E9E
STRING: There was no uneasiness at all.

LABEL: 0x2FF2
STRING: 「It doesn't matter if you're a member of ROMLES or an attendant of the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x3037
STRING: 「It doesn't matter which you belong to.」

LABEL: 0x30D9
STRING: 「Think about what you should do yourself.」

LABEL: 0x3185
STRING: Those words meant for Yukari, however, were etched in the hearts of everyone there.

LABEL: 0x322D
STRING: Even if I died in the next few minutes, I mustn't forget what he had said until the very last moment.

LABEL: 0x3424
STRING: His left hand glowed dimly in response to hers.

LABEL: 0x3488
STRING: So, it was too late after all...

LABEL: 0x34C3
STRING: 「...Do you think you're a prince or something?」

LABEL: 0x34F0
STRING: Still groaning in pain, Reiri smiled.

LABEL: 0x354A
STRING: That ugly sneer mocking all others was unmistakably hers.

LABEL: 0x35A1
STRING: 「Rather than pretending, why don't you cry and scream in misery?」

LABEL: 0x35E9
STRING: 「You're going to die, too. There's no escaping it.」

LABEL: 0x3615
STRING: 「What's the point of leaving words and thoughts like that behind?」

LABEL: 0x365B
STRING: 「If you're going to die anyway, you should've saved that attendant instead.」

LABEL: 0x36A5
STRING: 「You're a cruel man, you know that?」

LABEL: 0x36F7
STRING: Reiri hurled harsh words at him.

LABEL: 0x3723
STRING: Hiragino didn't say anything back to her.

LABEL: 0x3745
STRING: He looked down at her with the same fatherly face as before.

LABEL: 0x3804
STRING: 「You feel sorry for me and think you're a saint now?」

LABEL: 0x3832
STRING: 「Don't look at me with those eyes.」

LABEL: 0x387D
STRING: 「Reiri-kun, you want to live, don't you?」

LABEL: 0x38E2
STRING: 「Touri was the one who wanted to live.」

LABEL: 0x3941
STRING: I didn't know what she meant by that.

LABEL: 0x396B
STRING: However, contrary to the words she spun, there was a nostalgic ring to them.

LABEL: 0x39CF
STRING: Hiragino nodded without saying anything and turned back to us, holding her by the shoulders.

LABEL: 0x3A42
STRING: 「You want to use the rescue ship, right?」

LABEL: 0x3AF2
STRING: 「I'm sure there's medicine comparable to the emergency room in there.」

LABEL: 0x3B9D
STRING: Help would come someday, we would be saved,

LABEL: 0x3BCD
STRING: and there was nothing to worry about――

LABEL: 0x3CA0
STRING: Hiragino wrapped her outstretched arm around his neck,

LABEL: 0x3CDA
STRING: and lifted her up with both his arms.

LABEL: 0x3D06
STRING: ...The part where their bodies touched emitted a faint glow.

LABEL: 0x3F49
STRING: 「I'll leave Yukari and Tokiwa-kun to you.」

LABEL: 0x3F84
STRING: As he spoke, he walked past us and into the hallway.

LABEL: 0x415F
STRING: She was sitting flat on the floor of the emergency room, hanging her head.

LABEL: 0x419B
STRING: Tokiwa was seeing the two off without saying a word.

LABEL: 0x41CF
STRING: Knowing everything, abandoning everything, giving up everything...

LABEL: 0x420D
STRING: ――Because, surely, there was no hope of being saved.

LABEL: 0x4249
STRING: Hiragino might not be planning to die.

LABEL: 0x427D
STRING: Maybe he and Reiri would try and resist to the very end.

LABEL: 0x4468
STRING: Before I knew it, I was shouting.

LABEL: 0x4490
STRING: There was no way it would solve anything.

LABEL: 0x44BA
STRING: The volume of my voice wouldn't change a thing.

LABEL: 0x44F0
STRING: But I had no choice but to scream.

LABEL: 0x4514
STRING: If I did that, I might be able to reach them.

LABEL: 0x465D
STRING: How could he say something like that?

LABEL: 0x468D
STRING: They were leaving behind the most well-equipped place inside this cramped submarine.

LABEL: 0x46DB
STRING: How would that help them survive...?

LABEL: 0x4715
STRING: I stopped myself from reaching my hand out to him.

LABEL: 0x474D
STRING: Hiragino glanced at me and smiled softly.

LABEL: 0x480F
STRING: 「I never got a chance to show you my ability as a doctor.」

LABEL: 0x487F
STRING: 「It's true that I'm not that proud of my career, but I don't think I'm bad at it.」

LABEL: 0x496D
STRING: Hiragino shook his head at her dismayed state.

LABEL: 0x4A45
STRING: 「Well, what I'm trying to say is...」

LABEL: 0x4B06
STRING: 「We have a chance, whether you believe me or not.」

LABEL: 0x4BF8
STRING: His clear eyes pierced my chest.

LABEL: 0x4C90
STRING: It had to be a lie.

LABEL: 0x4CDE
STRING: Hiragino smiled, embarrassed, after telling me that.

LABEL: 0x4D18
STRING: His expression was that of determination.

LABEL: 0x4D6C
STRING: There was no way I could say anything.

LABEL: 0x4D94
STRING: All we could do was send them off.

LABEL: 0x4DCE
STRING: That was all we could do――

LABEL: 0x4E30
STRING: Yukari's voice cut through the air.

LABEL: 0x5026
STRING: A loud noise was approaching from afar.

LABEL: 0x518D
STRING: Tokiwa quickly peeked out to the hallway.

LABEL: 0x51BF
STRING: Only her face poked through the open door, and after that, she spun around to face us.

LABEL: 0x531C
STRING: To the left, at the end of the hallway...

LABEL: 0x53C7
STRING: It was just as she said.

LABEL: 0x5419
STRING: No, it was worse than I had imagined.

LABEL: 0x551B
STRING: There was more of it than we had ever seen before.

LABEL: 0x5553
STRING: The word "surging" was an apt description.

LABEL: 0x5591
STRING: The light approached us, accompanied by a rushing sound.

LABEL: 0x55E1
STRING: It was nothing more than a mass of revulsion.

LABEL: 0x56C0
STRING: 「Let me repeat myself. This is bad.」

LABEL: 0x570F
STRING: We had to close the door for now...

LABEL: 0x5739
STRING: I pulled Tokiwa back to the room and closed the door behind me――

LABEL: 0x58A4
STRING: 「There'll be no escape from this room.」

LABEL: 0x59B3
STRING: Even if she said that, how were we supposed to get past that thing out there?

LABEL: 0x5A03
STRING: If we were attacked by something like that, we wouldn't stand a chance...

LABEL: 0x5AB1
STRING: It was too soon to decide that.

LABEL: 0x5AC9
STRING: How were we supposed to escape that light which was closing in on us with such force?

LABEL: 0x5B1F
STRING: There was nothing we could do.

LABEL: 0x5C11
STRING: Why was something like that inside the <SHEEP III>――

LABEL: 0x5D3B
STRING: Yukari pushed me away and jumped out.

LABEL: 0x5D9B
STRING: An arrow was fired at the mass of light.

LABEL: 0x5E07
STRING: The horrifying light didn't cease its approach and continued to spread through the area.

LABEL: 0x5EA7
STRING: This wasn't good... I was shaking.

LABEL: 0x5EE3
STRING: Unlike the room back in the rear section, there was no way to escape in this narrow hallway.

LABEL: 0x5F63
STRING: The light-bearing crustaceans reached for Yukari's feet and――

LABEL: 0x5FB9
STRING: Just as I was stepping forward to jump in front of her...

LABEL: 0x608B
STRING: Hiragino dashed out of the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x60B3
STRING: He kicked the luminescent organism with all his might, protecting Yukari.

LABEL: 0x62C0
STRING: Light surrounded him as he shouted.

LABEL: 0x63CA
STRING: ――It didn't matter if he was already infected.

LABEL: 0x6564
STRING: ――In fact, Reiri was still alive after being attacked by it.

LABEL: 0x6714
STRING: ――Yes. Unlike him, I could tell because I had encountered that light many times by now.

LABEL: 0x6766
STRING: My instincts were telling me that there was something strange going on.

LABEL: 0x6840
STRING: I had to stop him. I grabbed Hiragino's arm.

LABEL: 0x695E
STRING: It was not directed at the light, but at me.

LABEL: 0x69A2
STRING: It was only due to the impact of being knocked onto the floor that I realized what was happening.

LABEL: 0x6AFB
STRING: My breathing stopped for a moment. As it resumed, I felt a pain running through me.

LABEL: 0x6B3B
STRING: He had hit me in the stomach using all his strength with the arm I was grabbing.

LABEL: 0x6D36
STRING: This was bad... I couldn't move.

LABEL: 0x6D5A
STRING: At this rate, I'd be attacked too.

LABEL: 0x6D84
STRING: I had to get up before the light reached me.

LABEL: 0x6E6A
STRING: I was on the floor of the emergency room after being hit just now. There was a wall between me and the light.

LABEL: 0x6ECE
STRING: ――Hiragino. His figure was protecting me instead of the door.

LABEL: 0x6F0C
STRING: The wave of light was now about to reach his waist.

LABEL: 0x70A9
STRING: An ear-splitting cry made me instinctively turn around to look toward the back of the room.

LABEL: 0x70FD
STRING: This was the first time I'd ever heard her scream since she had only talked in a low, hoarse voice thus far.

LABEL: 0x7151
STRING: Following her scream, she collapsed to the floor while trembling.

LABEL: 0x71F3
STRING: Was she injured or in pain?

LABEL: 0x7213
STRING: She arched her back and continued to cry out as if bursting.

LABEL: 0x724B
STRING: All I could do was watch her from a distance.

LABEL: 0x728F
STRING: Wha... What was going on all of a sudden――

LABEL: 0x7321
STRING: Her body emitted even more light.

LABEL: 0x734F
STRING: As if in response to the lights in the hallway, points of light squirmed around her body.

LABEL: 0x739F
STRING: It was like the light, which had started to seem somewhat familiar to me,

LABEL: 0x73C9
STRING: was asserting that it was something unknown to humanity.

LABEL: 0x74CE
STRING: There was something about that light...

LABEL: 0x74F4
STRING: ――I returned my gaze toward the door.

LABEL: 0x75BA
STRING: Hiragino continued defending against the light.

LABEL: 0x75EC
STRING: He chased it away as it tried to make its way inside, and the point of light on his right hand moved along with his pulse.

LABEL: 0x7734
STRING: What a stupid thing to ask.

LABEL: 0x775A
STRING: But, it was my honest impression.

LABEL: 0x77BA
STRING: What was going on now, or what might happen in the future.

LABEL: 0x78B2
STRING: I had to do something. About the light outside. About Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x78F6
STRING: I stood up on one leg while holding my hurting stomach.

LABEL: 0x792E
STRING: I pushed away Yukari, who was standing near the entrance.

LABEL: 0x79D2
STRING: Something far larger than anything I'd seen before.

LABEL: 0x7A0A
STRING: Countless legs covered in something like thorns.

LABEL: 0x7A3C
STRING: There was a figure of a creature in the middle of it.

LABEL: 0x7AEE
STRING: Why was something like that here?

LABEL: 0x7B1A
STRING: In this submarine, in the deep sea, how could such a warped existence――

LABEL: 0x7CBB
STRING: The speargun lying at her feet was caught in a vortex of light.

LABEL: 0x7CF7
STRING: There was no way to fight back now. All our weapons had been lost――――

LABEL: 0x7D33
STRING: The only thing separating us from the luminescent creature now was the fallen Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x7DC7
STRING: Even with his breathing ragged, he spoke.

LABEL: 0x7E62
STRING: 「...What are you standing around for, Yukari?!」

LABEL: 0x7E90
STRING: 「Think about what you have to do!」

LABEL: 0x7EEC
STRING: I held out my hand toward Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x80B1
STRING: 「Are you trying to trample on Hiragino-san's will?!」

LABEL: 0x8144
STRING: I returned to the emergency room and grabbed Tokiwa's arm.

LABEL: 0x8172
STRING: We leaped out and turned our backs to the light as we ran.

LABEL: 0x82BF
STRING: Yukari didn't look back even once.

LABEL: 0x82E3
STRING: I chased after her small back.

LABEL: 0x830D
STRING: I held Tokiwa's hand and followed Yukari.

LABEL: 0x833B
STRING: And as we were running, I glanced back――

LABEL: 0x839F
STRING: The door to the emergency room was open.

LABEL: 0x83C5
STRING: It was flowing inside through that door.

LABEL: 0x846B
STRING: That's right... Hiragino wasn't the only one we left behind.

LABEL: 0x84A3
STRING: She was still in that room.

LABEL: 0x84E3
STRING: The girl whose hand I didn't take.

LABEL: 0x870D
STRING: This time, I had to save her.

LABEL: 0x8747
STRING: I didn't want to kill her again.

LABEL: 0x877F
STRING: But, who was I to think that after killing 50 people I didn't even know the faces of?

LABEL: 0x87F3
STRING: That was no reason to abandon Reiri, who was alive all this time.

LABEL: 0x8906
STRING: Her voice was strong, like Hiragino's.

LABEL: 0x8952
STRING: It echoed through the dark, endless hallway.

LABEL: 0x898B
STRING: 「Are you going to waste the lives of those who died?!」

LABEL: 0x8B40
STRING: 「Don't go thinking that you have any control over the lives of countless other people.」

LABEL: 0x8B8E
STRING: 「There are things you've finally grasped right here, aren't there?」

LABEL: 0x8C07
STRING: Something was squeezing my right hand tightly.

LABEL: 0x8DA4
STRING: What was I supposed to do...?

LABEL: 0x8DCE
STRING: Could I allow myself to have confidence?

LABEL: 0x8F52
STRING: I chased after Yukari, who had started running again.

LABEL: 0x8F94
STRING: Without an answer, I began running again.

LABEL: 0x9115
STRING: When we arrived back at the wheelhouse, it quietly accepted us as if nothing had happened.

LABEL: 0x926D
STRING: Only the three of us were left.

LABEL: 0x9302
STRING: Yukari had been whispering to herself continuously ever since we made it here.

LABEL: 0x93FE
STRING: Tokiwa and I didn't try to stop her,

LABEL: 0x9440
STRING: as she muttered like she was trying to convince herself.

LABEL: 0x94D7
STRING: We wanted to believe it, too.

LABEL: 0x94FF
STRING: That the two of them were alive.

LABEL: 0x9521
STRING: That they had to be alive.

LABEL: 0x95F8
STRING: When I looked up, the embedded LCD clock pointed to 12:36.

LABEL: 0x963E
STRING: We couldn't stay here like this forever.

LABEL: 0x96AE
STRING: At this rate, there was no way we'd be able to think of a plan to escape

LABEL: 0x96EC
STRING: with our feelings confused and mixed like this.

LABEL: 0x9740
STRING: We were averting our eyes from reality again――

LABEL: 0x97D0
STRING: Her eyes were red and swollen.

LABEL: 0x97EE
STRING: She smiled in self-derision as she wiped her eyes with her hand, trying to hide them.

LABEL: 0x98C6
STRING: 「Why... am I living carelessly, unable to die?」

LABEL: 0x991E
STRING: 「How would Hiragino-sensei encourage us all at a time like this?」

LABEL: 0x9A44
STRING: 「There's no point in thinking about that now, is there?」

LABEL: 0x9BB4
STRING: Seeing that I was about to back down, Yukari continued.

LABEL: 0x9C90
STRING: 「Her worn-out body... Even if sensei does his best, how long do you think she'll last?」

LABEL: 0x9D49
STRING: 「Her corpse is being kept alive by <COOS>...」

LABEL: 0x9D81
STRING: 「If the <COOS> parasite is removed from her, she'll die.」

LABEL: 0x9DD1
STRING: 「If she's just going to continue living in pain like that,

LABEL: 0x9E11
STRING: it would be better to kill her.」

LABEL: 0x9E94
STRING: Just as I opened my mouth to object...

LABEL: 0x9EF8
STRING: It echoed through the silent wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x9F1E
STRING: I looked up to see Yukari holding her cheek.

LABEL: 0xA01F
STRING: She was rubbing the palm of her hand after slapping Yukari.

LABEL: 0xA061
STRING: Tokiwa's eyes, however, immediately glared at her.

LABEL: 0xA091
STRING: Yukari just stood there, unable to process what had just happened.

LABEL: 0xA213
STRING: 「"I hate those who don't value life. Die."」

LABEL: 0xA31A
STRING: 「Unlike Katagiri-san, you had a clear intent to kill and took her life.」

LABEL: 0xA36A
STRING: 「And not just her. That man as well.」

LABEL: 0xA3F5
STRING: Giving her no room to run away...

LABEL: 0xA495
STRING: 「She... Reiri-chan said that she didn't want to die.」

LABEL: 0xA4FB
STRING: 「It was right to not kill her.」

LABEL: 0xA531
STRING: 「You didn't end up making any more mistakes.」

LABEL: 0xA590
STRING: However, I could tell that behind her voice was a burning, fiery anger.

LABEL: 0xA5E9
STRING: 「You shouldn't talk about life and death so carelessly.」

LABEL: 0xA629
STRING: 「You shouldn't say that you want to die or that someone should be killed.」

LABEL: 0xA66B
STRING: 「I'll tell you if you don't already know...」

LABEL: 0xA7E5
STRING: She spoke straight from her heart.

LABEL: 0xA8D7
STRING: 「What do you want me to do?」

LABEL: 0xA97C
STRING: 「Do you think I can make amends by just sitting here and waiting to die with the two of you?」

LABEL: 0xAA61
STRING: 「If I'm going to expose such a miserable figure, I'd rather――」

LABEL: 0xAAC6
STRING: 「Have you already forgotten Hiragino-san's last words?!」

LABEL: 0xAC44
STRING: 「It doesn't matter which you belong to.」

LABEL: 0xAC7A
STRING: 「Think about what you should do yourself.」

LABEL: 0xAD4F
STRING: 「"Are you going to waste the lives of those who died?"」

LABEL: 0xAE40
STRING: Those were the words Yukari had said to me.

LABEL: 0xAE66
STRING: 「It's the same for you and me.」

LABEL: 0xAFA3
STRING: 「Do you intend to set a good example for a beautiful young girl like me?」

LABEL: 0xB03A
STRING: She was the last person I wanted to hear that from.

LABEL: 0xB064
STRING: I wanted to say that, but there was no way I could.

LABEL: 0xB0C0
STRING: We had to accept their wishes...

LABEL: 0xB311
STRING: 「A dependable Yukari-san is the Yukari-san I know.」

LABEL: 0xB3B6
STRING: Yukari was about to accept her handshake but stopped herself.

LABEL: 0xB4FC
STRING: 「If you touch me and get infected with <COOS>――」

LABEL: 0xB541
STRING: Yukari put her hand on the cheek Tokiwa had just slapped.

LABEL: 0xB583
STRING: She turned pale before our eyes.

LABEL: 0xB679
STRING: Tokiwa took Yukari's hand forcibly as she spoke.

LABEL: 0xB754
STRING: Tokiwa had a special sense of sight.

LABEL: 0xB776
STRING: Hearing that from the girl who could see <COOS>, Yukari firmly squeezed her hand back.

LABEL: 0xB891
STRING: 「Now then... Let's think of a way to get you back safely.」

LABEL: 0xB938
STRING: 「If we don't, Hiragino-sensei will get mad at us.」

LABEL: 0xB97F
STRING: She forced a smile on her face.

LABEL: 0xB9A5
STRING: Tokiwa tilted her head in dissatisfaction.

LABEL: 0xBAE2
STRING: 「I won't forgive you if you throw your life away now.」

LABEL: 0xBB16
STRING: 「――You have a responsibility to live for Akari-chan's sake.」

LABEL: 0xBB67
STRING: And so, we began to face forward once more.
